subject: Re: [junit] JUnit 4.4 Maven Deployment
msgSnippet: Casey, I don t know who s done this in the past.  Can you do it?  What support do you need? David Saff
messageBody:
Casey,

I don't know who's done this in the past. Can you do it? What
support do you need?

David Saff

>

>
> Cheers
> Casey
